reasonDescription: Unauthorized charge. Provide a signed and imprinted or magswiped sales ticket; or copy of order form/invoice, along with evidence of positive AVS.
resolutionMessage: Unauthorized charge. Provide a signed and imprinted or magswiped sales ticket; or copy of order form/invoice, along with evidence of positive AVS.

reasonDescription: Unauthorized charge. Supply invoice or order form, evidence of positive AVS response received and proof of delivery to the AVS confirmed address.
resolutionMessage: Unauthorized charge. Supply invoice or order form, evidence of positive AVS response received and proof of delivery to the AVS confirmed address.
